title: Impact of single-member-district system on parties

content.question: Compared to parties in a proportional-representation system, parties in a single-member-district system are typically

choices.label: more likely to have their own social networks
more tightly linked to specific cultural identities

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Compare political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
